A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I hated this movie and everything about it. Felt bad for the actors that were in it\, especially Mark Hamill and John Boyega. This is what happens when you get so cynical and deconstruct everything: there is nothing positive left to root for. \n\nThat said\, I have so much invested in my decades of Star Wars fandom that I will see Rise of Skywalker anyway. Yes\, it helps that Rian Johnson isn't involved.
